name: Scrawled in Blood
description:
Featuring art by cryocannon!

Scrawled in Blood is a ttrpg inspired by my fascination with the logs, journals, and desperate writings left behind by the unseen (alive at least) inhabitants of survival horror. To match my fascination, the game has players writing their own cryptic and foreboding log to form the basis of the perilous adventure they're about to embark on!

A game for a GM and 1-5 players, Scrawled in Blood is about players uncovering and surviving the unknown dangers of a secluded manor as one of five survival horror protagonists.

This game uses the following (or their digital equivalents)
-Pens
-Paper
-Probably too many dice (i love messin' with 'em!)
